p: Introducing OST programmes with various coverage levels was found to lead to 19% to 37% reduction in the number of incident infections among PWID. A reduction in injecting frequency by 30% and in the number of PWID by 10%, as a result of OST, would avert up to 80 infections per year in Afghanistan, Libya, Morocco and Tunisia; over 1100 infections in Egypt; and about 2500 infections in each of Iran and Pakistan (TableÂ 3).
